alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rockingham, eastern Cheshire and Hillsborough Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Antrim to near Merrimack to near Salem. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Derry, Jaffrey, Merrimack, Salem, Bedford, Milford, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, Peterborough, New Boston, Brentwood, Antrim, Mont Vernon, Greenfield, Lyndeborough, Dublin and Francestown. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
